mapper.sql: id, bankName, parentId, parent_ids, level, totalFunds, totalDeposit, totalWithdraw, totalOverdraft, totalLoan
mapper.select: SELECT id, areaname, areacode,zipcode,level,sort,position from area WHERE parentId = #{parentId}
mapper.insert: insert into bank (id, bankName, parentId, parent_ids, level, totalFunds, totalDeposit, totalWithdraw, totalOverdraft, totalLoan) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalfunds,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{totaldeposit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{totalwithdraw,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{totaloverdraft,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{totalloan,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

insert into bank
id,
bankName,
parentId,
parent_ids,
level,
totalFunds,
totalDeposit,
totalWithdraw,
totalOverdraft,
totalLoan,

mapper.update:
update bank
bankName = #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
parent_ids = #{parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
totalFunds = #{totalfunds,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
totalDeposit = #{totaldeposit,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
totalWithdraw = #{totalwithdraw,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
totalOverdraft = #{totaloverdraft,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
totalLoan = #{totalloan,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update bank set bankName = #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, parent_ids = #{parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, totalFunds = #{totalfunds,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, totalDeposit = #{totaldeposit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, totalWithdraw = #{totalwithdraw,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, totalOverdraft = #{totaloverdraft,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, totalLoan = #{totalloan,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
